ComicInfo.Title: A Girl Under the Influence; Private September; Saturday Night Fever
ComicInfo.Summary: El Bute’s 3-issue series Casual Sex is so popular we have decided to add a couple of more issues to one of our most favorite series. From group sex, anal sex, and oral sex to girl on girl sex action, El Bute has a powerful and energetic way to bring out the lust in any sexual situation. Spain’s master pornographer is back with another issue of pure easy-going, nonchalant, and apathetic sex.
